website_summaries.verdict: The Acer Iconia Tab 8 has the design edge for budget slates, but you can find a faster performing tablet in the same price range.
pros: The Acer Iconia Tab 8 has a slim build and stylish aluminum back
It has a microSD card slot and a micro-HDMI port
Performance is smooth when switching between apps
cons: Large games and apps are sluggish to load
You can't uninstall most of the pre-loaded software

customer_reviews.title: ... been using this tab for 3 weeks and its great. The back camera is not all that great ...
customer_reviews.text: So far I have been using this tab for 3 weeks and its great. The back camera is not all that great the pictures only looks good if you take it out. The front camera is better then the back in my opinion. Watching Netflix and playing games is not a problem, the screen is bright and precise. I would recommend this for anyone especially persons who are studying like me. Its small to fit in my bag and pull out in class and I have my notes and books on it.
customer_reviews.author: Abby S.

customer_reviews.title: Caution
customer_reviews.text: Nice tablet for the price, however Acer does not supply operating system updates. From reading online, this is standard practice for Acer when they make tablets. You will be stuck with Android KitKat 4.4 forever. I already have apps that are incompatible with my tablet because the OS is so old and an update is not available.
customer_reviews.author: Candice J. King

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price, not very user friendly with expandable storage
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these, one for each of my boys. It's a great tablet... however you cannot move apps to run off a memory card without rooting and installing a custom ROM. I expect to do this soon to make it easier for my gamer to have more games, and also easier for me for my "tv/movie" kid to get things on the tablet. Without the custom ROM I need to copy a file to the tablet's internal storage, then move it to the SD card. 5 stars if it had Android 5.x or didn't have this manufacturer limit for only running apps from internal storage.
customer_reviews.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: but the touchscreen on these (I ordered two) is one of the worst I've ever experienced in a tablet or phone
customer_reviews.text: It's powerful, but the touchscreen on these (I ordered two) is one of the worst I've ever experienced in a tablet or phone. Typing on one is outright horrible, and get used to backspacing many, MANY times, as it loves double- and triple-typing letters/numbers/etc. Also, they're a little quirky. One of mine right out of the box loses functionality in its 'BACK' button (actually, most of the very lower left corner of the screen) after 10mins. or so of use and has to be restarted. After that it stays working.
customer_reviews.author: Thorhammer

customer_reviews.title: Okay tablet
customer_reviews.text: Had this tablet for almost a year, got it for $125 which isn't bad for the price. Good for reading or watching videos and movies but sometimes takes a while to load things. Not good for playing games though, some games don't even run on it and others do but the tablet gets very hot and usually shuts off if you play more than 20 mins. Would spend more money on a tablet next time to get something better like a Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd Acer I have bought (had the other one over two years and bought this one as a replacement only because my husband dropped our old one and cracked the screen!). Never had any problems with our old one or so far with this new one. Have had the new one for about 3 months now. We use it for lots of things, but mostly my husband uses it for online games.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna L.

customer_reviews.title: Forever androd 4.4 KitKat
customer_reviews.text: Acer does not provide updates, this tablet will always use 4.4 KitKat
customer_reviews.author: Ale L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice middle priced tablet. Stylish Value!
customer_reviews.text: I can't imagine finding a better tablet for the money. A very nice HD display. Quick and responsive. Very stable. Reasonable battery life.
customer_reviews.author: FotoMike

customer_reviews.title: Above and beyond...
customer_reviews.text: Far exceeds my expectations! Looks and feels very professional. I have never purchased an Acer product before, but I will definitely be doing so in the future. Great investment that meets my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Sammons

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet, it handles all my apps well and the camera is better than i expected, i love the display and the fact that i can use the face unlock feature in my privacy settings and i can disable the sleep function with touch by using the 5 finger gesture or my thumbs. Its uses wi-fi well and i have no problems with it so far
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall great tablet
customer_reviews.text: Loving this tablet! Not discounting some other people's reviews of defective units, but mine is great. If you know going in that this is NOT a high end tablet you could overlook the minor shortcomings.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Whitney

customer_reviews.title: not as good as the acer iconia last year
customer_reviews.text: not as good as the acer iconia last year. its oblong and hard to find a case for tablet. Dont buy case if its suggested with product as i did and it did not fit at all...not even close
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Tablet.... Faster than my octa-core tab that has 4gb Ram memory.
customer_reviews.author: Barry R.

customer_reviews.title: Reconsider buying this product
customer_reviews.text: Exceptionally good quality specs but I have had a problem with its battery from day one. The battery port does not show if it is charging our not. The battery drains rapidly even when it is switched off. More pertinently zero support for the product outside US. Trued technical support in India and Singapore. India did not even both to help. Singapore said it requires a firmware update
customer_reviews.author: Ronald

customer_reviews.title: No longer supported. Defect never resolved.
customer_reviews.text: What a shame. Hardware wise, this was a great tablet. But it was plagued with a power problem from its release. The tablet is notorious for shutting down on its on. Acer did nothing to resolve the issue. The tablet has been ABANDONED by them. Don't believe me? Go to their website. Under support enter the model number. Nothing will come up! Its as if they never made it. It is gone from support. ZERO.
customer_reviews.author: pckarma112

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tablet for the price with a close to pure Android interface
customer_reviews.text: Screen resolution is fantastic,videos are crisp and clear. With an Intel processor and 2 gb ram the tablet never stalls or hangs up. The 16 gb storage is a little short, wish it had 32 gb because you cannot delete the (mostly unnecessary) included Acer installed programs and you cannot transfer them to the sd card. Other than that the tablet feels solid and performs as expected.
customer_reviews.author: CascadianAaron

customer_reviews.title: Not Recommended. Old operating system and useless SD card slot.
customer_reviews.text: Tablet performs ok but the operating system is not upgradeable. My came with an Android 4.4. We are at 6 now. Also, the SD card is really not usable. You cannot transfer apps or files there. Why even have it? With it's 16 gig internal storage you will find out that's it's too small. The tablet will do weird things as you approach the limit.
customer_reviews.author: Lester M. Chan

customer_reviews.title: not good
customer_reviews.text: Not happy ! shuts down or freezes up All the time ! Don't like the file system either! I would not buy it again l have aLenovo work much better!
customer_reviews.author: gambuci

product_meta.title: Acer Iconia A1-840FHD-10G2 8-inch Tablet (Intel Atom Z3745 Quad-core processor, 2 GB RAM, 16 GB flash memory, Android operating system)
product_meta.description:
Acer Ionia Tab 8 is a highly portable 8-inch tablet with a Full HD display with Zero Air Gap technology and Intel Atom quad-core processor for a fast and immersive multimedia experience. The Ionia Tab 8 also sports a sleek and elegant design with a sophisticated metallic silver rear cover and slim profile that fits comfortably in one hand. Its excellent value, stylish design and great functionality make it compelling for young users and families.

AMAZON.COM
feature_bullets: 8-inch Display, 1920 x 1200 resolution, Active Matrix TFT Color LCD
Intel Atom Z3745 1.33 GHz Quad-core processor
16 GB Flash Memory, 2 GB LPDDR3 RAM Memory

specifications.Graphics Coprocessor: Intel Atom Z3745 1.33 GHz Quad-core processor
specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars42 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
